tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Data (
    device_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    anomaly_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    last_reported_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    data_value DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE AnomalyEvents (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id),
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    details VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE data_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES iot_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    anomaly_type TEXT,
    anomaly_score FLOAT,
    detected_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES data_records(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    issue_severity TEXT,
    reported_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (detection_id) REFERENCES anomaly_detection(detection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    detected_at TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type TEXT,
    anomaly_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    detection_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    device_name TEXT,
    firmware_version TEXT,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);
